K12D0602_H0558:319a-1: bye ba man chang gdab pa'i sngags dang bsam pa'i rgyud ni; kun kyang 'dra'o //
K12D0602_H0558:319a-2: de la mchod rten gcig btab na /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-3: bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang cho ga ni /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-4: 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams cad la
K12D0602_H0558:319a-5: sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o
K12D0602_H0558:319a-6: // na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'an /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-8: bandhe ratna ta yan shu bha na /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-9: aaksho bhya aa mi t'a ban tsa ban de /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-10: aa ham aa lo ki tam/
K12D0602_H0558:319a-11: na ma stryee dh'a nu ga t'a n'an; sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'an /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-16: sh'i ba ni r'a ku le /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-17: ye shes ya sho ba ti /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-18: te dze te tso ba ti /
K12D0602_H0558:319a-19: srba buddha aa dhi shthi te sv'h'a /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-0: mu dra 'debs pa'i 'ji @319b ba'am; sngags bri ba'i che lan bdun gdab pa'i sngags la /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-4: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'ah'a /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-6: aom bdzrod bha b'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-7: tse ti'i por bu'i nang dang /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-8: sa tsha'i nang du phye ma btab pa'am /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-9: snum gyis byug pa'i sngags la /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-10: aom badzra aa ra dze bi ra dze sv'ah'a /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-13: aom dharma dh'a tu garbhe sv'ah'a /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-14: tse ti'i phor bur 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'i sngags la /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-15: aom badzra dh'a tu garbhe sv'ah'a /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-16: tho ba rdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-17: aom bdzra mung+ga ra aa ko ta ya h'um; tse ti'i phor bu nas phyir dbyung ba'i sngags la /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-19: 'khor lo dang dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-20: aom bhra ma ta na ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-21: tse ti'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag pa'i sngags la /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-22: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'ah'a /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-23: cho ga de ltar byas na /
K12D0602_H0558:319b-24: tse ti gcig btab pas bye ma snyed btab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0602_H0558:319b-25: thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0602_H0558:319b-26: dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'ji ba can gyis gar na bar bskus na /
